column5: The Housing Studies programme provides you with a critical insight into the development of housing systems, policies and practices, and a framework for discussing the development, financing and management of housing. The degree is professionally accredited by the Chartered Institute of Housing (CIH). Upon completion, you can become a chartered member of the CIH.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
